Those who refused to comply with the empire's laws were forced to listen to the organ's eerie sounds for hours on end, a punishment designed to break their spirits and make them obey. The organ's music was so mesmerizing that even the most rebellious citizens eventually learned to comply with the empire's every command. As time passed, the empire grew stronger, its people conditioned to comply without question, all under the watchful sound of the mighty organ.
